_meta.description: Luxury feature data for scoring calculation
_meta.methodology: Brand tier + interior materials + features + tech + quietness
_meta.formula: raw = brand_tier + interior + features + tech + quietness; score = 1 + (raw / 8) * 9

sidekick.source: Suzuki specs 1998 - basic compact SUV interior

grand_vitara.source: Suzuki specs 2013 - improved refinement over Sidekick

f150_xlt.source: Ford.com 2025 F-150 XLT: 12" SYNC 4 + 12" cluster, cloth seats, 6-speaker audio

tacoma_sr5.source: Toyota.com 2025 Tacoma SR5: 8" display, 7" digital cluster, cloth seats

silverado_trail_boss.source: Chevrolet.com 2025 Silverado LT Trail Boss: 13.4" touchscreen, 12.3" cluster, heated cloth seats

ram_1500_big_horn.source: Ram 2025 1500 Big Horn: 12" Uconnect 5, 7" cluster, cloth/vinyl seats

crv_exl.source: Honda.com 2025 CR-V EX-L: 9" display, 7" cluster, leather seats, moonroof

hrv_exl.source: Honda.com 2025 HR-V EX-L: 9" display, leather seats, moonroof, no digital cluster

ridgeline_rtl.source: Honda 2025 Ridgeline RTL: 9" display, 7" TFT cluster, leather, moonroof, heated seats

q5_quattro.source: Audi 2025 Q5 Premium Plus: B&O 3D audio, pano roof, HUD, 11.4" MMI + 12.3" Virtual Cockpit, leather

q7_quattro.source: Audi 2025 Q7 PP: B&O audio standard, 10.1"+8.6" displays, 12.3" Virtual Cockpit, leather. No vent seats/pano/air susp/HUD on PP.

q8_etron.source: Audi 2024 Q8 e-tron Prestige: B&O 3D, pano roof, air susp, vent seats, HUD all standard. EV  very quiet.

a6_allroad.source: Audi 2025 A6 Allroad PP: B&O, pano roof, air susp, vent seats standard. Dual-pane glass. No HUD on PP.

crosstrek_premium.source: Subaru 2025 Crosstrek Premium: 11.6" display, cloth, 6-speaker, no digital cluster.

atlas_se.source: VW 2025 Atlas SE: V-Tex leatherette, vent seats, 12" touch, 10.25" Digital Cockpit. 6-speaker.
